comment.text: This translation key is used to display a mobile-specific editing feature description. It appears on a component that showcases product benefits and is related to the "Upgrade To Pro" feature. Translators should update this description to reflect the product's editing capabilities in a mobile context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Arbeit auf mobilen Geräten' (Work on mobile devices) doesn't accurately reflect the meaning of 'Mobile editing.' It's too literal and doesn't convey the concept of editing specifically on a mobile device.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation would focus on the action of editing, such as 'Mobile Bearbeitung' or 'Bearbeiten auf dem Handy'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ການຂຽນແກ້ໄຂມືຖື' literally translates to 'Mobile writing editing'. While understandable, it's not the most natural or accurate representation of 'Mobile editing'. A more appropriate translation would convey the action of editing on a mobile device.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການແກ້ໄຂໃນມືຖື (gaan gae khai nai mue thii) - Editing on mobile

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Rediģēšana mobilajās ierīcēs' is a bit literal. A more natural and concise translation would be 'Mobilā rediģēšana' or 'Rediģēšana mobilī'.

The translation 'ජංගම සංස්කරණය' while technically meaning 'mobile editing', doesn't fully capture the nuance of a banner item for upgrading to a pro version. It's too literal. A more suitable translation would convey the action of upgrading or the benefit of the pro version on mobile.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'ජංගම වෘත්තීය අනුවාඩුවට යාවත්くる' (Mobile Professional Version Upgrade) or 'ජංගම විශේෂාංග' (Mobile Features) depending on the specific context of the banner.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Úpravy pomocou mobilných zariadení' is a bit literal and verbose. While accurate, it doesn't convey the same brevity and user-friendliness as 'Mobile editing.'. A more natural and concise translation would be better.
